alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 6:29AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A line of thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Aroostook County through 715 AM EDT... At 626 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of thunderstorms from Dudley Township northwest to Oxbow, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mars Hill, Easton, Bridgewater, Smyrna, Dudley Township, Scopan, Littleton, Monticello, Blaine, Westfield, Dudley, Webbertown, Saint Croix and Number Nine Mountain. This includes US Highway 1 between Monticello and Mars Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
